sentences.en: "How do we know that?" rapped out Lester.
sentences.cn: “我们怎么会知道？”莱斯特突然大声说道。

sentences.en: I was close by as Lester was stretchered into the ambulance.
sentences.cn: 莱斯特被用担架抬进救护车时我就在旁边。

sentences.en: Lester, rather than his brother, is the person to speak to.
sentences.cn: 莱斯特, 而不是他弟弟, 是我们谈话的对象.

sentences.en: Lester: Excellent, but I made some last - minute changes to our plans.
sentences.cn: 雷斯特: 太好了.但我最后又把我们的计画修改了一些地方.

sentences.en: Lester: FastTrek has been considering acquiring a cable - and - parts manufacturer for some time.
sentences.cn: 雷斯特: 青云科技好一阵子以来一直想收购一家电缆和零件的制造商.

sentences.en: Lester： I already have a job.
sentences.cn: 莱斯特：我已经有工作了。

sentences.en: Lester: I’ve been writing for this magazine for fourteen years, Brad.
sentences.cn: 莱斯特：布莱德，我为这家杂志社写了十四年的文章。

sentences.en: Lester: They're designed with special attention to ergonomics, making typing easier.
sentences.cn: 雷斯特: 它们是特别针对人体工学而设计的, 可以让打字更轻松.

sentences.en: Lester: Yes, we supply connectors and cables to meet all your needs.
sentences.cn: 雷斯特: 是的, 我们有提供符合您所有需求的连接器和电缆线.

sentences.en: Lester: Yes. We keep finding problems when testing the boards.
sentences.cn: 莱司特: 没错.我们测试声卡时一直发现问题.

sentences.en: Myra Lester : Every parting from you is like a little eternity.
sentences.cn: 玛拉·莱斯特: 每一次和你分别都有些像是永别.

sentences.en: Myra Lester: Well, what am I going to do instead?
sentences.cn: 玛拉.莱斯特: 好吧, 那么我去干吗 呢 ?

sentences.en: Situation: Lester is discussing quality - control problems with Jim Bennet.
sentences.cn: 情境: 雷斯特正在和吉姆班尼特讨论品管问题.

sentences.en: Situation: Lester is discussing the company's Internet operations with Helen.
sentences.cn: 情境: 雷斯特正和海伦在讨论公司的网路营运.

sentences.en: Situation: Lester is talking to his marketing manager, Helen Parker.
sentences.cn: 情境: 雷斯特正和行销经理海伦派克讲话.

sentences.en: Situation: Lester Sawyer and Helen Parker are discussing business over lunch.
sentences.cn: 情境: 雷斯特索耶和海伦派克在午餐时谈论工作的事.

sentences.en: These comments by Joy and Lester were reflective of the general attitude.
sentences.cn: 乔伊和莱斯特的这些评论反映了普遍的态度.
